did.abstract: The 96th Street Branch of The New York Public Library was opened in 1905. The library building was designed by the architectural firm of Babb, Cook & Willard and was constructed with funds provided by Andrew Carnegie. Publicity materials documenting activities at the 96th Street Branch of The New York Public Library.

bioghist.p: The 96th Street Branch of The New York Public Library was opened in 1905. The library building was designed by the architectural firm of Babb, Cook & Willard and was constructed with funds provided by Andrew Carnegie.

scopecontent.p: Publicity materials documenting activities at the 96th Street Branch of The New York Public Library.
